China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 6 日星期二 07:23:07 GMT 120
North Korea defectors cite dwindling food rations, market reliance -studyThe majority of North Koreans who resettled in South Korea over the last decade said they never received government rations in the isolated state and had to rely on an informal market to survive, a study issued by Seoul's unification ministry showed. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 07:04:01 GMT B6IHVPG3A5OSTCQWPWZPOVTCNI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-defectors-cite-dwindling-food-rations-market-reliance-study-2024-02-06/Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
China markets leap on prospect of policy boostChinese equities headed for their biggest gains in 14 months on Tuesday and the yuan rose on further signs of state support for markets and a news report that President Xi Jinping was set to discuss markets with financial regulators. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 06:55:04 GMT BAMXJHQF4VJRFMSX5ZQSOOJHA4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/view-china-markets-leap-prospect-policy-boost-2024-02-06/Reuters市场亚洲市场
China regulator unveils more curbs on short-sellingChina's securities regulator said on Tuesday it would suspend brokerages from borrowing shares for lending and cap the size of so-called securities refinancing, as part of further efforts to curb short-selling. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 05:15:25 GMT B3V5NO6GGBKYXONNFB7EFD2UVA https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/china-regulator-unveils-more-curbs-short- sell-2024-02-06/Reuters市场亚洲市场
EU aims to agree key path towards green industry ambitionsEuropean Union policymakers hope to agree new rules on Tuesday to promote domestic production of equipment for solar and wind power, fuel cells and other clean technologies to ensure its industry can compete with Chinese and U.S. competitors. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 05:03:36 GMT S45MBNGQEJN23DEXI2BBAGZ4AQ https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/climate-energy/eu-aims-agree-key-path-towards-green-industry-ambitions-2024-02-06/Philip Blenkinsop可持续发展气候与能源
Messi hopes to play in Tokyo friendly after Hong Kong letdownAfter disappointing a legion of fans in Hong Kong with a no-show on the pitch at the weekend, Lionel Messi left open the possibility of playing in Inter Miami's friendly in Tokyo, saying he left "much better" than he did a few days ago. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 05:03:18 GMT RU4BZLEIHZJ6VJEUAYDNTIG25A https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/messi-hopes-play-tokyo-friend-after-hong-kong-letdown-2024-02-06/Chang-Ran Kim运动的足球
China says it opposes and cracks down on all forms of cyberattacksThe Chinese government does not tolerate any form of cyberattacks and will not allow any country or individual to engage in such illegal activities using Chinese infrastructure, its embassy in the Philippines said. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 03:34:52 GMT RXMVBUNN4ZIXZGMHPRX22W3TX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-it-opposes-cracks-down-all-forms-cyberattacks-2024-02-06/Reuters世界亚太地区
Chinese stocks surge on rescue efforts; dollar, yields steadyAsian shares rode a sharp rise in Chinese stocks higher on Tuesday as Beijing ramped up efforts to put a floor under its slumping market, but elsewhere investors were cautious as bets trimmed for a near-term Federal Reserve rate cut. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 02:35:28 GMT VYLRMDPYEZJCJEB3GE3R56TT24 https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-02-06/Rae Wee市场
Exclusive: Taiwan ally Guatemala mulls commercial ties with China, foreign minister saysGuatemala is considering reaching out to develop formal trade ties with China, the Central American country's foreign minister told Reuters on Monday, although it plans to maintain its existing relations with Taiwan. Tue, 06 Feb 2024 02:28:01 GMT ULIJPK6WKFKFLOTJMLU2R423GY https://www.reuters.com/world/taiwan-ally-guatemala-mulls-commercial-ties-with-china-foreign-minister-says-2024-02-06/Sofia Menchu世界
Snow, ice disrupt trips home for millions of Chinese ahead of Spring FestivalFreezing rain, snow and ice have complicated the journey home for many in central and eastern China, as billions travel ahead of the Spring Festival in chilly weather. Japan's SMBC hires former Credit Suisse China boss StoehrJapan's Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp (SMBC) said on Tuesday it has hired former Credit Suisse China boss Carsten Stoehr as its deputy head for the Asia Pacific region. Dollar drifts, Aussie gains on prospect of rate hikeThe U.S. dollar wobbled near a three-month peak as expectations the Federal Reserve is unlikely to cut rates aggressively this year take hold, while the Australian dollar rose after the central bank said it could not rule out another rate hike.
